title: Fluids - Buoyant force on a cube tied to a string

content.question: Which of the following indicates how the density of the cube <math alttext="rho sub c end sub" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>c</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> compares with the density of the fluid <math alttext="rho sub f end sub" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>f</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> and provides correct evidence for the comparison?

choices.label: <math alttext="rho sub c end sub , is greater than , rho sub f end sub" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>c</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>f</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> because the cube is completely submerged.

<math alttext="rho sub c end sub , is less than , rho sub f end sub" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>c</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>f</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> because the cube is completely submerged.

<math alttext="rho sub c end sub , is greater than , rho sub f end sub" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>c</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>f</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> because the force of tension is not zero.

<math alttext="rho sub c end sub , is less than , rho sub f end sub" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>c</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>f</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> because the force of tension is not zero.

content.answer: <math alttext="rho sub c end sub , is less than , rho sub f end sub" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>c</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>f</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> because the force of tension is not zero.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
